statements: SELECT * FROM FraudActivities WHERE transaction_id = 100
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM FraudActivities WHERE transaction_type = 'payment'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM FraudActivities WHERE user_id = 500
SELECT * FROM FraudActivities WHERE suspicious_activity = TRUE
SELECT user_id, transaction_type FROM FraudActivities WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM FraudActivities WHERE suspicious_activity = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM FraudActivities WHERE transaction_type = 'credit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM FraudActivities GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM FraudActivities WHERE transaction_amount > 5000 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM FraudActivities WHERE transaction_type = 'debit' GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_transactions > 5 ORDER BY num_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE;
SELECT location, amount FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, location FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) FROM fraudulent_transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount FROM fraudulent_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM suspicious_activity GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activity WHERE activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND activity_timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND account_id = 12345;
SELECT owner_name, account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT alert_type, alert_date FROM alerts WHERE alert_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT owner_name, account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 1001 AND amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Fraud' ORDER BY alert_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT transactions.*, accounts.owner_name FROM transactions INNER JOIN accounts ON transactions.account_id = accounts.account_id WHERE accounts.balance > 5000 ORDER BY accounts.balance DESC, transactions.transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = true;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profile WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM transaction_patterns ORDER BY pattern_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activity WHERE is_flagged = true ORDER BY activity_id ASC;
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_profile WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date, customer_id FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND is_fraudulent = TRUE LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10;
SELECT * FROM customer_profile ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;

SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date, customer_id FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND is_fraudulent = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT flag_id, description FROM flags;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM accounts GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_balance > 5000
SELECT t.transaction_id, u.username, t.amount, t.transaction_date FROM transactions t INNER JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.is_fraudulent = TRUE ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC
SELECT MAX(balance) AS highest_balance FROM accounts
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, COUNT(sa.activity_id) AS num_activities FROM users u LEFT JOIN suspicious_activities sa ON u.user_id = sa.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id ORDER BY num_activities DESC
